text: can you suggest me how can I create dynamic pages with hubDB
^^ I second this. I would be interested in seeing some examples and best practices for this with hubDB
need to show different content with different pages
that should help point you in the right direction :slightly_smiling_face:
I have worked on it but list is showing in one page I need to show hubDB row with different pages
This should be your code for the Dynamic HubDB, you dont need to actually place the table id in the `elif` statement and the main opening tag is what HS needs to evaluate that it is a dynamic page
Hopefully this helps clear it up a bit for you
